elevatorsimulation.participants
Interface Elevator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ElevatorImpl
public interface Elevator

Interface which an Elevator class should implement.

Author:
vijay

void stopElevator()
Sets the elevator to be stationary. It is no longer moving.

peopleEnter

java.util.Set<PersonImpl> peopleEnter(java.util.Set<PersonImpl> enteringPeople)
This function takes a set of people who want to enter the elevator, and allows them to enter provided they want to go in the same direction of the elevator, and the elevator is not full.

Parameters:
enteringPeople - : People who could potentially enter the elevator
Returns:
Set of people who entered the elevator

removeAllPeople

void removeAllPeople()
Remove all people from the lift and reset all its buttons pressed. This is called when the lift becomes faulty
